LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned.label: 獠牙野豬
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned.description: 獠牙野豬是有四隻腳的野豬,背部上有一排毫毛、獅鼻和獠牙.\n\n獠牙野豬有四隻眼睛和像是骨頭的面具,似乎是被黑色的血管狀繫帶緊緊卡進面部,牠的背部和腿上有一排骨板保護,並且有兩組獠牙,其中一組又大又彎,然而牠們的腹部相較之下成為弱點,幾乎沒有護甲或防禦手段.
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned.tools.0.label: big tusks
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned.tools.1.label: small tusks
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned.tools.2.label: 頭
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Summoned_Corpse.label: 獠牙野豬屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigas_Summoned.label: Arma Gigas
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigas_Summoned.description: Arma Gigas is a subtype of Geist, which is a possession-type Grimm. This Arma Gigas takes on the appearance of a medieval suit of armor and appears to have a high degree of swordsmanship.
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigas_Summoned.tools.0.label: 右手
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigas_Summoned.tools.1.label: 左手
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigas_Summoned_Corpse.label: Arma Gigas corpse
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigasSword_Summoned.label: Arma Gigas
LanguageData.Grimm_ArmaGigasSword_Summoned.descriptio: Arma Gigas is a subtype of Geist, which is a possession-type Grimm. This Arma Gigas takes on the appearance of a medieval suit of armor and appears to have a high degree of swordsmanship.
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Summoned.label: 索矛蜂
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Summoned.description: Lancers have a three-segmented black body with three sets of legs. They have a white armored mask and armor along their back. On the back of their abdomen, the armor is in four overlapping plates. They have jagged pincers, antenna, four red transparent wings and a stinger.
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Summoned.tools.0.label: 刺
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Summoned.tools.1.label: 嘴
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Summoned_Corpse.label: lancer corpse
